name: so you singaporean, ah?
description:
Discover Singapore's architecture, heritage, religion, and culture through interactive storytelling. 

A game made by undergraduate NUS students in hopes of sharing the beauty of local architecture and the importance of conserving the buildings and spaces we hold dear to our hearts for years to come. Immerse yourself in the world we've created, share this game, and leave any thoughts in the discussions – we'd love to hear from you. 

Play in your browser or download now below.

Image Credits & Disclaimer
